metadata.title: CVE-2018-0494 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
GNU Wget before 1.19.5 is prone to a cookie injection vulnerability in theresp_new function in http.c via a \r\n sequence in a continuation line.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0494` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wget - 1.17.1-1ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wget package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.17.1-1ubuntu1.4').
